mapper.sql: doc_type_id AS docTypeId, type_code AS typeCode, doc_type_name AS docTypeName, node_type AS nodeType, row_index AS rowIndex, parent_type_id AS parentTypeId, create_user AS createUser, create_time AS createTime, update_user AS updateUser, update_time AS updateTime
mapper.select: select * from ( select t.doc_type_name as 'text',t.type_code as 'value', t.doc_type_id as 'docTypeID',t.type_code as 'typeCode', t.node_type as 'nodeType',t.row_index as 'rowIndex' ,null as parentID from tb_doc_type t where t.parent_type_id in (select doc_type_id from tb_doc_type where parent_type_id is null and type_code=#{typeCode} ) union all select t.doc_type_name as 'text',t.type_code as 'value', t.doc_type_id as 'docTypeID',t.type_code as 'typeCode', t.node_type as 'nodeType',t.row_index as 'rowIndex' ,t.parent_type_id as parentID from tb_doc_type t where t.parent_type_id in ( select t.doc_type_id from tb_doc_type t where t.parent_type_id in (select doc_type_id from tb_doc_type where parent_type_id is null and type_code=#{typeCode} ))) a order by a.parentID,a.rowIndex

select d.doc_name as 'title',d.doc_url as 'url',d.doc_id as 'docID',d.business_id as 'businessID',d.doc_type_id as 'docTypeID',lower(d.file_type) as 'ext' from tb_doc d where d.business_id=#{businessID} and d.doc_type_id in (
select doc_type_id from ( select t.doc_type_id from tb_doc_type t where t.parent_type_id in (select doc_type_id from tb_doc_type where parent_type_id is null and type_code=#{typeCode} ) union all select t.doc_type_id from tb_doc_type t where t.parent_type_id in ( select t.doc_type_id from tb_doc_type t where t.parent_type_id in (select doc_type_id from tb_doc_type where parent_type_id is null and type_code=#{typeCode})))a)

select t.doc_type_name as 'text',t.type_code as 'value', t.doc_type_id as 'docTypeID',t.type_code as 'typeCode', t.node_type as 'nodeType',t.row_index as 'rowIndex' ,null as parentID from tb_doc_type t where t. type_code=#{typeCode} order by t.row_index
